title: First and Second Stages for Next Ariane 6 Flight En Route
summary:
ArianeGroup has confirmed that the first and second stages for the next Ariane 6 flight have begun the transatlantic voyage aboard the sail-assisted transport ship Canopée. The first Ariane 6 flight was launched on 9 July from Europe’s launch facility in French Guiana. While Arianespace, the rocket’s commercial operator, had initially stated that the next […]

summary: Blue Origin aims to launch its first mission before the end of 2024. It will carry the company’s Blue Ring technology as its primary payload.
